name: cascading
description:
This one is a bit more complicated:

VQGAN+CLIP into Video Pro X for editing, then into recur which is really putting in some work with the shader matrix. Played recur through WAAAVES for video mixing/synthesis/feedback and then into TouchDesigner for live "post" processing. Then back into Video Pro X for further editing.

I did not intentionally imitate the beautiful rugwork of the First Nations peoples such as the Hopi but there is definitely an inadvertent similarity.
